Police name victim of fatal Weymouth crash, five dead on roads in two days https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-name-victim-of-fatal-weymouth-auckland-crash- Five-dead-on-roads-in-two-days/NXTOBOGAQJFPTGQQFI7G3O26RY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-name-victim-of-fatal-weymouth-auckland-crash- Five-dead-on-roads-in-two-days/NXTOBOGAQJFPTGQQFI7G3O26RY/ The 29-year-old died in a single-car crash on Friday. Sun, 24 Nov 2024 02:49:57 +0000 Police have named the victim of a crash in Weymouth on Friday, during a deadly weekend on New Zealand roads. Photo / NZME.

Sun, 24 Nov 2024 02:00:00 +0000 The suspected suicides of Northland teenagers Ataria Heta, Summer Mills-Metcalf, Hamuera Ellis-Erihe and James Murray are under inquiry in a coroner's court in Whangārei.

Online predator Finn Cottam who terrorised his victims caught after ‘one small mistake’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/online-predator-finn-cottam-who-terrorized-his-victims-caught-after-one-small-mistake/FAQSOENTQBDVRC7SE5A6EBHNMI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/online-predator-finn-cottam-who-terrorized-his-victims-caught-after-one-small-mistake/FAQSOENTQBDVRC7SE5A6EBHNMI/ Tracy NealPolice: 'It took nearly two years to charge Cottam and get justice for his victims.' Sun, 24 Nov 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Finn Cottam was sentenced in the Nelson District Court to seven years in prison for his sustained, violent and lengthy campaign of online sexual abuse against women. Photo / Tracy Neal
